abstract: United States beats Finland, 4-1, in women's world hockey championship; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Hilary Knight had two goals and an assist as the United States beat Finland, 4-1, in Malmo, Sweden, to improve to 2-0 in Pool A play in the women’s world hockey championship.
snippet: Hilary Knight had two goals and an assist as the United States beat Finland, 4-1, in Malmo, Sweden, to improve to 2-0 in Pool A play in the women’s world hockey championship.
